 * Two out of the three test results in feedback_chat_tests.txt were generated by 1) running your server, 2) running your client, and 3) running our own client that sends its user name followed by a chat message, and immediately disconnects. Many submissions failed these tests due to the server not behaving correctly after the second client disconnects.
2 / 3
